usage.cn: 幸福不是取决于外界环境，它由我们的心态来决定。戴尔卡耐基（Dale Carnegie）
usage.eng: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

usage.cn: 你是一道条件不完整的数学题，我永远也给不出正确的答案。
usage.eng: You are the one condition of incomplete mathematics problem, I will not give the correct answer.

usage.cn: 感情不需要诺言，协议与条件。它只需要两个人：一个能够信任的人，与一个愿意理解的人。
usage.eng: Relationships don't need promises, terms and conditions. It just needs two people: who can trust and who can understand.

usage.cn: 感情不需要诺言，协议与条件。它只需要两个人：一个能够信任的人，一个愿意理解的人。
usage.eng: Emotional need not promise, agreement and conditions. It only needs two people: a person to trust, a willing to understand.
